Site by Peter Lyons. Visual Design by [Carly Gloge](http://warb.co/).

#Neckbeard info
* Site is coded in jade, markdown, and html templates
* stylus is used for CSS preprocessing
* app runs the express.js framework on node.js
* everything except the photo gallery is statically pre-compiled and served as flat files by nginx
* blogs were originally wordpress but now flat files generated by custom code that migrated them to markdown/html files
